name: ReportingAd
desc: The response to a request to fetch ad-level reports.

items.name: adDisplayStatus
items.desc: The DisplayStatus derived from the ad serving status.You can use the EQUALS and IN selector Condition operators with Get Ad-Level Reports within a campaign.

items.name: adGroupId
items.desc: The unique identifier for the ad group the creative belongs to.You can use the EQUALS and IN selector Condition operators with Get Ad-Level Reports within a campaign.You can use this field with the orderBy selector.

items.name: adId
items.desc: A unique identifier representing the assignment relationship between an ad group and an ad. You can use the EQUALS, IN, and STARTSWITH selector Condition operators with Get Ad-Level Reports within a campaign.

items.name: adName
items.desc: The unique name of a custom product page. The adName has to be unique within its ad group.You can use this field with the orderBy selector.

items.name: adServingStateReasons
items.desc: Provides a reason why an ad was not served.You can use this field with the orderBy selector.

items.name: campaignId
items.desc: The unique identifier for a campaign.This field is available to use with the orderBy selector.

items.name: creationTime
items.desc: The date and time of the creation of the ad object.You can use this field with the orderBy selector.

items.name: creativeId
items.desc: The unique identifier for a creative.You can use the EQUALS and IN selector Condition operators with Get Ad-Level Reports within a campaign.

items.name: creativeType
items.desc: The type of creative asset. Synonymous with type in the Creative object.You can use the EQUALS and IN selector Condition operators with Get Ad-Level Reports within a campaign.

items.name: deleted
items.desc: Deleted creative assets.You can use the EQUALS selector Condition operators with Get Ad-Level Reports within a campaign.

items.name: modificationTime
items.desc: The date and time of the most recent modification of the object.You can use this field with the orderBy selector.

items.name: orgId
items.desc: The identifier of the organization that owns the campaign. Your orgId is the same as your account in the Apple Search Ads UI.You can use this field with the orderBy selector.

items.name: status
items.desc: The status of creative assets.You can use this field with the orderBy selector.
